name: Brewing Drawings
description:
Wanna be an artist witch for a while and just work on brewing some cute drawings?

Well, welcome to the witch house in Brewing Potions. You'll search for ingredients to combine in your cauldron to create your pictures and then... put them up on your wall!

(This is a short game made in Rpg Maker MV for JamCraft 3.)

Controls:

  • Select: Z/Space/Enter/Left mouse button
  • Menu/Cancel: X/Esc/Right mouse button
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
